abstract: Albuquerque Police Officers Keith Sandy and Dominique Perez will face murder charges in shooting death of James Boyd.
lead_paragraph: Two Albuquerque police officers will be charged with second-degree murder in the shooting death last year of a homeless man in the mountains where he had been camping, a special prosecutor said Monday.

headline.main: New Mexico: 2 Officers Face Murder Charge
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: 2 Officers Face Murder Charge

snippet: Two Albuquerque police officers will be charged with second-degree murder in the shooting death last year of a homeless man in the mountains where he had been camping, a special prosecutor said Monday.
